newsitem.title: UK: MOTOR RACING-MORBIDELLI NEW FERRARI TEST DRIVER.
newsitem.headline: MOTOR RACING-MORBIDELLI NEW FERRARI TEST DRIVER.

text.p: The Italian Ferrari Formula One motor racing team on Friday confirmed that Italian Gianni Morbidelli would be their test driver for the 1997 season.

Morbidelli, 29, last raced in Formula One with the Arrows team in 1995, securing the best result of his career in his final grand prix in Australia where he finished third. He had most recently been linked with a drive with Williams Renault in the British Touring Car championship.
He has competed in 60 grands prix, including one for Ferrari when he stood in for sacked former world champion Alain Prost in the 1992 Australian Grand Prix.
